item.description:
Updating this event to show the start time as 7:30 PM when we'll meet in the lobby -- as opposed to the play's start time of 8:00. I'll be in lobby at 7:30 & then at 7:45, I and whoever has arrived from our group, will be going into the theatre to take our seats.

This is a lot of fun! Don't miss out. If you're interested, I'd suggest calling the box office to buy your ticket ASAP because I was told that the tickets are selling quickly -- particularly with this being a Saturday night performance. (Additional details re tickets/box office below.)

Harvard's Hasty Pudding Theatricals is the oldest collegiate theatrical troupe in the country, annually performing a hilarious student-written drag burlesque musical. ...A magical journey to the greatest subcontinent in the world - the exotic & erotic land of India - as HPT unveils the eccentric epic Kashmir If You Can. The beloved Maharajah has suddenly & mysteriously died & panic has taken the kingdom by storm. His daughter, the air-headed heiress to the kingdom, Sari M. Notsari, is now forced by her scheming & soulful stepmother, Queen Latikah, into an arranged marriage with the evil slumdog millionaire, Pooch Yermoneywhereyermouthis - an actual dog and an actual millionaire, who has secret plans to take over the kingdom. Sari hires the world-famous British detective, now suffering from short term memory loss, Watson Yourmind to investigate her father's death & that suspicious mutt..." Website: http://www.hastypuddi....

PLEASE NOTE: You are responsible for buying your own tickets ($38). If you're interested, I'd suggest calling the HPT box office at 617-495-5205 (Mon. - Fri. 12-5) ASAP, because tickets are selling quickly.

I'll be sitting in Row G in the middle section but you can sit anywhere that you choose. We'll meet at 7:30 PM in the lobby and I'll be there with a Meet Up sign. Seating begins at 7:30 PM and the show starts at 8 PM. If people are interested, we could meet up again in the lobby afterwards to go out for drinks/snacks.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby with a Meet Up sign from 7:30 to 7:45 PM (at 7:45 we'll go in to take our seats). I'm 5'8", have brown hair and glasses, and will be wearing a black coat.
item.name: Hasty Pudding Theatricals 163: Kashmir If You Can
